name: The Pandemic (noobishere137)
description:
Endless 2d topdown virus shooting game with some cool boss fights. Was made by 4 people in 1-2 months from scratch. Engine used was Godot.

Theres only Indonesian language for now, but the game has almost no story. Most Gameplay elements are in English.
W/A/S/D - walk
Spacebar - dash

LMB - shoot

RMB - throw bombs

Try it out :)
